a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Emissions of air pollutants, World, 1750 to 2022
Air pollutants are gases that can lead to negative impacts on human health and ecosystems. Most are
produced from energy, industry, and agriculture.

g.text: Non-methane volatile organic compoundsNon-methane volatile organic compounds

text.tspan: Data source: Community Emissions Data System (CEDS) 2024.
